Submodules¶

wellcomeml.logger module¶

Set up shared logger

wellcomeml.logger.build_logger(logging_level, name)¶
wellcomeml.logger.get_numeric_level(level)¶

wellcomeml.utils module¶

wellcomeml.utils.check_cache_and_download(model_name)¶

Checks if model_name is cached and return complete path

wellcomeml.utils.throw_extra_import_message(error, extra, required_module)¶

Safely throws an import error if it due to missing extras, and re-raising it otherwise
